      <button aria-label="Open reactions menu" aria-expanded="false" id="ember1985" class="artdeco-button artdeco-button--muted artdeco-button--2 artdeco-button--tertiary ember-view reactions-menu__trigger" data-finite-scroll-hotkey="l"><!---->

          </div>
        
    </div>
  </div>

                      <div dir="ltr" class="update-components-text relative">
    <span dir="ltr"><!---->1. Introduction to spectroscopy (pavia)<!----><span><br></span><!---->2. Organic chemistry (morison and boyd)<!----><span><br></span><!---->3. Spectrometeic identification of organic compounds (silverstein and Webster and kiemle)<!----><span><br></span><!---->6. Modern analytical chemistry (David Harvey)<!----><span><br></span><!---->Ÿáÿ± ⁄©ÿØŸàŸÖ ⁄©Ÿá ÿ®ÿ¥Ÿá ŸÖŸÜ ÿßÿ≥ÿ™ŸÇÿ®ÿßŸÑ ŸÖ€å⁄©ŸÜŸÖ üòÅ<!----></span>

            <span class="comments-comment-social-bar__social-counts-separator t-12 t-black--light t-normal
                pr1"></span>
          <span aria-hidden="true" class="comments-comment-social-bar__replies-count">
            3 Replies
          </span>
          <span class="visually-hidden">
            3 Replies on Mehdi Dolati‚Äôs comment
          </span>    </div>

        </a>

              Like
            </span>
        </div>
      
</span></button>

      <button aria-label="Open reactions menu" aria-expanded="false" id="ember3144" class="artdeco-button artdeco-button--muted artdeco-button--2 artdeco-button--tertiary ember-view reactions-menu__trigger" data-finite-scroll-hotkey="l"><!---->

    <use href="#caret-small" width="16" height="16"></use>
</svg>

      
</span></button>
    </span>
  <span class="comments-comment-social-bar__social-counts-separator t-12 t-black--light t-normal
            pr1"></span>
        <button class="comments-comment-social-bar__reactions-count--cr
            hoverable-link-text

    <img class="reactions-icon comments-comment-social-bar__count-icon reactions-icon__consumption--small data-test-reactions-icon-type-LIKE data-test-reactions-icon-theme-light" src="https://static.licdn.com/aero-v1/sc/h/8ekq8gho1ruaf8i7f86vd1ftt" alt="like" data-test-reactions-icon-type="LIKE" data-test-reactions-icon-theme="light" data-test-reactions-icon-style="consumption" data-test-reactions-icon-size="small">

<!---->          </section>

          </time>

        <div class="comments-comment-meta__info">
            <span class="comments-comment-meta__data">
              (edited)

          </time>

            <span class="comments-comment-social-bar__social-counts-separator t-12 t-black--light t-normal
                pr1"></span>
          <span aria-hidden="true" class="comments-comment-social-bar__replies-count">
            2 Replies
          </span>
          <span class="visually-hidden">
            2 Replies on Khosro Pakmanesh‚Äôs comment
